itomato:
i·to·ma·to     /eye təˈmeɪtoʊ, -ˈmɑ-/ [eye-tuh-mey-toh, -mah-] –noun, plural -toes.

Linux admin, part-time developer of a Graphics-oriented distribution - focusing on F/OSS Graphics projects and formats:

* ImageMagick
* Inkscape
* Scribus
* The GIMP
* SVG, PNG

In it's professional life, itomato engineers a global deployment of High-Availability SLES boxes.

http://itomatos.flotsm.com

mailto:itomato@itomatos.flotsm.com
